dct_description_sm: California as an unlabeled island at a significant distance off the coast of North America with five islands off southern coast. Crude outlines of the continents based on cartography of more than a century earlier.
Issued in: Kupfersammlung zu J. B. Basdows Elementarwerke fur die Jugend und ihre Freunde. -- Berlin: 1774.
H. F. Schlegel del. (bottom left, above border).
Upper North American land mass still shows connection to Asia above 45 degrees.
